title: gradle plugin raise error when upgrade quarkus
body:
### Describe the bug

i'm use quarkus with gradle, when i upgrade the quarkus, it report error again and again. i must delete all cache, then it works, when i upgrade from 2.5.1 to 2.5.2, from 2.5.2 to 2.5.3 and so on, it appear again and agin,

### Expected behavior

could Smooth upgrade quarkus

### Actual behavior

[root@hr-recruit02 hr-recruit]# gradle clean quarkusBuild

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

What went wrong:
io/quarkus/gradle/tooling/GradleApplicationModelBuilder
io.quarkus.gradle.tooling.GradleApplicationModelBuilder

Try:
Run with --stacktrace option to get the stack trace.
Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output.
Run with --scan to get full insights.

Get more help at https://help.gradle.org

### How to Reproduce?

1.use a old release quarkus, and download all dependency, it should works.
2.upgrade to a higher version quarkus

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Microsoft Windows [版本 10.0.19044.1415]

java version "17" 2021-09-14 LTS Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 17+35-LTS-2724) Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 17+35-LTS-2724, mixed mode, sharing)
